definition: A unit of measurement typically used to quantify temperature or angles. It is commonly employed in scientific, mathematical, and meteorological contexts.

examples.german: Der Kaffee ist genau nach meinem Geschmack, nicht zu heiß und nicht zu kalt, genau der richtige Grad.
examples.english: The coffee is just to my taste, not too hot and not too cold, just the right degree.

examples.german: Er hat den höchsten akademischen Grad erreicht.
examples.english: He has achieved the highest academic degree.
